channel.title: Need help with my server!
channel.description: how do i let ppl join my server but it says its offline when i try to post in the server status page... and why sometimes when i change "character-rights" to 0 to 3 and save it dosnt let me be a admin? someone help me out.

item.title: Need help with my server!
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

Log off for changing yourself to an admin.

Deleted file (yourname in the game).dat in the directory(folder) savedgames.

Go to characters directory and find yours, change charecter-rights = 0 to character-rights = 3.

Read full topic
